ygData.subject: Re: cleric mailing list- eq-clerics@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Baelstorm, There is already a cleric mailing list.  eq-clerics@onelist.com Subscribing is the same way you subscribed to this list.  If you were thinking
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Baelstorm,

There is already a cleric mailing list. eq-clerics@onelist.com

Subscribing is the same way you subscribed to this list. If you were
thinking of starting another cleric list with unique topics and such
you might want to ask around the eq-clerics list first. There
might already be a site for that! =)

//Aldaren



On Fri, Jun 18, 1999 at 09:39:26AM -0230, Squires, Dean wrote:
> From: "Squires, Dean" <DeanSquires@...>
>
> I want to start a Cleric mailing list. Any clerics out there, please
> reply and I'll add you.
>
> Baelstorm
>
